name: Hold On
content: 当夜晚开始弥漫的时候
I lay awake when I should be sleeping
我躺在床上，却无法入眠
像阿加莎一样秘密的进行
I hold on  I hold on
Working everyday living for the weekend
每天不断的工作，只为周末的休息
我不知道该如何结束这无尽的黑夜
就像一个冠军在等待奥运会
I hold on  I hold on
我们全力以赴，对付闪光灯下的恶魔
别想让别人赢得这场战役
When you might as well quit
Hold on  hold on  hold on
就像一个赌徒一直在输
I hold on  I hold on
我们在闪光灯下和魔鬼一起起舞
When you might as well quit
Hold on  hold on  hold on
So today this life goes on
So today this life goes on
我们在闪光灯下和魔鬼共舞
When you might as well quit
Hold on  hold on  hold on
When you might as well quit
Hold on  you gotta hold on  hold on
When you might as well quit
Hold on  hold on  hold on
When you might as well quit
